m_szDocSumamry: Ford puts self-driving car project in fast lane America’s second largest automaker Ford is shifting focus from Detroit to Silicon Valley as it plays catch up to technology innovations in the fast-changing mobility space. | TNN | Jul 4, 2015, 01.30 AM IST America’s second largest automaker Ford is shifting focus from Detroit to Silicon Valley as it plays catch up ... Read More PALO ALTO, CA: America's second largest automaker Ford is shifting focus from Detroit to Silicon Valley as it plays catch up to technology innovations in the fast-changing mobility space.
